#summary Collaborative drawing demo

=Collaborative drawing=
 * install dojo, dojox and dijit (from SVN) into demo-docroot
   (because it won't work with dojo from AOL CDN)

 * apply this patch to dojox.sketch.UndoStack.js:
{{{
+++ UndoStack.js
@@ -78,6 +78,9 @@
 				}
 			};
 			//console.log('dojox.sketch history add',state);
+			
+			dojox.cometd.publish("/chat/demo", {user: room._username, draw: state});
+			
 			this._steps.push(state);
 			this._undoedSteps = [];
 		},
}}}
